alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:31PM CDT until July 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CASS...SOUTHWESTERN TRAILL...NORTHEASTERN BARNES AND SOUTHEASTERN STEELE COUNTIES... At 331 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colgate, or 27 miles northeast of Valley City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Page, Galesburg and Colgate. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
